version_description:
If your game isn't loading, restart your device or email support@renownent.com for assistance.

• Faster loading
• Game engine minor version update
• iOS 8 compatibility improvements
• Bug and crash fixes
• SDK updates

Thank you for playing All-Star Basketball. Keep on shooting hoops!

Need help? Restart your device or Email support@renownent.com.

• NEW! Cross Platform Online Multiplayer

• Photon Servers Update
• Bug Fixes, SDK Updates

Thank you for playing our mobile basketball game, All-Star Basketball!

It's a quick update for you All-Star Ballers!

• NEW App Icon to keep it fresh!
• Bug Fixes

Keep the feedback and reviews coming and we'll keep improving the game for you.
Thanks for playing All-Star Basketball!

Another quick update to improve your basketball shooter experience!

• Bug fixes to keep your game awesome
• Code updates
• Game flow improvements

Thank you for playing and rating/reviewing All-Star Basketball 2K20!
#mambaforever

This update is all about improving your experience in ASB™ 2K20

○ NEW Built with Xcode12 (iOS14 Compatibility)
○ NEW Adaptive Banners, you have more screen space to play the game
○ NEW Upgraded Renown cross promo & offline system (faster UI/UX)
○ NEW Ad mediation system for faster and more stable gaming
○ Update SDKs for improved app stability
○ Bug fixes

Keep sending us your ratings and reviews so we can improve the game for 2K21!

The latest update for ASB 2K20 has arrived:

• Bug fixes
• Code updates

Keep sending us your ratings and reviews, and we’ll see you in 2K21!
